snippet.title: Magic Castle Trailer
snippet.description:
🧙 Magic Castle - a mini-jRPG experience 🧙 available on https://michalakweb.itch.io/magic-castle
🎥 Review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hoImdHfbLrE&t=23s 🎥 

Embark on an enchanting journey in "Magic Castle", a heartwarming adventure where bravery and magic intertwine. Step into the shoes of a young hero determined to unlock the secrets of the legendary Magic Castle.

Explore a quaint town teeming with peculiar troubles, from snake infestations to fog-shrouded forests. Guided by wise and quirky characters, you'll encounter a host of colorful personalities and uncover ancient mysteries.

Face challenging foes, solve puzzles, and navigate through a world where every corner holds a new mystery. With courage, wit, and a touch of magic, can you unveil the secrets hidden within the enchanted realm?

"Magic Castle" is a tale of adventure, wonder, and the power of love. Are you ready to step into this magical world and become the hero of your own story?

Features:
- a mini-jRPG experience
- turn-based combat
- no random encounters
- autosave
- accessibility options
- how long to beat: 30 minutes - 1.5 hours (depending on skill level, familiarity with the genre and a bit of luck)

🧙 Magic Castle - a mini-jRPG experience 🧙 available on itch.io
🎥 Review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hoImdHfbLrE&t=23s 🎥
